message.affixTextHelp: Make parts easy to identify by adding text to the model.
message.attachmentHelp: Attachments are used to maintain the bite position for physical models. They are only generated for cases which have an upper (maxillary) and lower (mandibular) scan.
message.deleteTemplate: Are you sure you want to delete this template?
message.deleteTemplate_one: Are you sure you want to delete this template?
message.deleteTemplate_other: Are you sure you want to delete these templates?
message.drainHolesHelp: Drain holes help avoid print failures by allowing air to enter, and resin to escape from within the model. This is a mandatory setting when printing hollow models, with hole positions determined automatically.
message.hollowModelHelp: Enable this option to create models that are hollowed out. This reduces the amount of material that is consumed when printing the model.
message.noTemplatesInfo: Create a template to reuse settings for new designs
message.removeTemplate: Are you sure you want to remove this template?
message.renameTemplate: A template with this name already exists. Rename the template to continue.
message.templateNameHelp: Easily identify your saved settings by giving it a memorable name. You will see this name in the Design template dropdown.
message.textStyleHelp: Engrave will cut the text into the model. Emboss will extrude the text out of the model.
